::Shadow Wing::

She took one look at him. She smiled warmly at him.  She put her had 
on his shoulder. She looked into his eyes.
"PRED POOP!"
She turned on her heels and walked down the hall.
"When you want to tell me what really happened, let me know."
She walked away and towards the entrance to the ship.

She knew he had to have run into trouble out there.  She also knew 
that if he told her what realy happened, his pride would be bruised.
But she wanted him to tell her the truth.  If she had to speak 
truthfully to him, he would have to be so to her.  She smiled, "yup, 
I have to so he has to as well."

She wasn't mad at him, but it did hurt that he felt that he couldn't 
tell her what happened out right.  Maybe he was trying to protect his 
pride? Maybe he lost the fight and didn't want to tell her? Who 
knows. But it did hurt that he couldn't just tell her outright. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:

platoon

out 
> of Stasis lock." He still didn't want to admit his stupidity to her.
>

luck
